function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Activity restriction during COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Decreased physical activity levels leading to health complications","Mitigation":"Promoting alternative physical activities at home, online classes, and enjoyable activities","Technologies":"Online platforms for physical activity classes, interactive fitness apps","People":"Adults, children, and adolescents with current health problems","Owner":"Health organizations, fitness instructors, parents"}]}
